text.div:
Results Laboratory Tests and Panels - IPS

Intensional Value Set Definition: LOINC {  {    STATUS in {ACTIVE}    CLASSTYPE in {1}    CLASS exclude {CHALSKIN, H&P.HX.LAB, H&P.HX, NR STATS, PATH.PROTOCOLS.*}  } } 

Copyright Statement:

This artifact includes content from LOINC®. LOINC codes are copyright Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and the Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes (LOINC) Committee. Terms & Conditions in https://loinc.org/license/

  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where STATUS = ACTIVE, CLASSTYPE = 1, CLASS matches (by regex) ^(?!PATH\.PROTOCOLS.*$).*, CLASS matches (by regex) ^(?!NR STATS.*$).*, CLASS matches (by regex) ^(?!H&P\.HX.*$).*, CLASS matches (by regex) ^(?!H&P\.HX\.LAB.*$).* and CLASS matches (by regex) ^(?!CHALSKIN.*$).*

name: LaboratoryTestsAndPanelsUvIps
title: Results Laboratory Tests and Panels - IPS
publisher: Health Level Seven International - Patient Care Work Group
